root.name: Strike Witches: Hakugin no Tsubasa
root.description: Strike Witches: Hakugin no Tsubasa is a horizontal twin-stick shoot 'em up developed by Gulti. It is based on the popular anime Strike Witches and was released in Japan on July 29, 2010.

similar_games.game: Deathsmiles II: Makai no Merry Christmas
